attributes.action: Reconsider plans to increase M.Ps Pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At this time of economic crisis I believe it to be a great insult to the electorate to even consider raising the pensions of M.Ps who are unworthy of the title Right Honourable. I  will never vote Labour if this vote is carried and shall watch how my local M.P votes.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
